lead_paragraph: A New York Times reporter will be subpoenaed to answer questions ahead of an upcoming trial of a former CIA officer accused of leaking classified information, though a Tuesday hearing indicated there is much confusion about what the journalist may be asked to reveal.

headline.main: Times Reporter's Testimony Sought in Leak Trial
headline.print_headline: Times Reporter's Testimony Sought in Leak Trial
